sqlMap.insert: insert into userinfo (userid, username, userpwd, email, phone,address) values (#userid#, #username#, #userpwd#, #email#,#phone#,#address#)
sqlMap.select: select * from userinfo where userid=#userid# and userpwd = #userpwd#
sqlMap.update: update userinfo set email=#email#, phone=#phone#, address=#address# where userid = #userid#
